Literature.Title: Effects of cyclic lipodepsipeptide structural modulation on stability, antibacterial activity, and human cell toxicity.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 27626(MIC=64µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12 ATCC 29181(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae K6 ATCC 700603(no activity data)
